metadata.title: CVE-2014-8548 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Off-by-one error in libavcodec/smc.c in FFmpeg before 2.4.2 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds access) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via crafted Quicktime Graphics (aka SMC)video data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8548` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:2.5.4-1
libav-tools - 7:2.5.4-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:2.5.4-1
libavcodec-extra57 - 7:2.5.4-1
libavcodec57 - 7:2.5.4-1
libavdevice57 - 7:2.5.4-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:2.5.4-1
libavfilter-extra6 - 7:2.5.4-1
libavfilter6 - 7:2.5.4-1
libavformat57 - 7:2.5.4-1
libavresample3 - 7:2.5.4-1
libavutil55 - 7:2.5.4-1
libpostproc54 - 7:2.5.4-1
libswresample2 - 7:2.5.4-1
libswscale4 - 7:2.5.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:2.5.4-1').
